languages.text: "Вот мы узнаем, что у тебя в нутре, инквизитор. Посмотрим, поступишь ли ты правильно или в очередной раз подтвердишь, что правила — не для вас".
"A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."
languages.original_text: "Вот мы узнаем, что у тебя в нутре, инквизитор. Посмотрим, поступишь ли ты правильно или в очередной раз подтвердишь, что правила — не для вас".

traits.locale_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that rules are not written for you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that rules are not written for you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “是时候让我们看看你的真面目了，审讯官。咱们来看看，你是会做正确的事情，还是会再次以为你有权凌驾于一切规则之上。”
languages.original_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."

traits.locale_text: “是时候让我们看看你的真面目了，审讯官。咱们来看看，你是会做正确的事情，还是会再次以为你有权凌驾于一切规则之上。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「本性を現すにはちょうどいい頃合いじゃないか、異端審問官。さて、お前が正しい行いをするのか、あるいは、やはり自分は規則なんぞに従う必要などないと思っているのか、見てみようじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."

traits.locale_text: 「本性を現すにはちょうどいい頃合いじゃないか、異端審問官。さて、お前が正しい行いをするのか、あるいは、やはり自分は規則なんぞに従う必要などないと思っているのか、見てみようじゃないか」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est le moment de montrer votre vrai visage, inquisiteur. Nous allons voir si vous êtes prêt à faire ce qui est juste ou si vous allez encore prouver que vous vous croyez au-dessus des règles. »
languages.original_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le moment de montrer votre vrai visage, inquisiteur. Nous allons voir si vous êtes prêt à faire ce qui est juste ou si vous allez encore prouver que vous vous croyez au-dessus des règles. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Un momento adecuado para mostrar su verdadera cara, Inquisidor. Veamos si hace lo correcto o intenta demostrarnos una vez más que se considera por encima de todo».
languages.original_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."

traits.locale_text: «Un momento adecuado para mostrar su verdadera cara, Inquisidor. Veamos si hace lo correcto o intenta demostrarnos una vez más que se considera por encima de todo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ein schöner Zeitpunkt, um Euer wahres Gesicht zu zeigen, Inquisitor. Mal sehen, ob Ihr das Richtige tut oder einmal mehr beweist, dass Ihr denkt, Ihr stündet über den Regeln."
languages.original_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."

traits.locale_text: "Ein schöner Zeitpunkt, um Euer wahres Gesicht zu zeigen, Inquisitor. Mal sehen, ob Ihr das Richtige tut oder einmal mehr beweist, dass Ihr denkt, Ihr stündet über den Regeln."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdi rengini göreceğiz Engizisyoncu. Doğru olanı mı yapacaksın yoksa kendini kanundan üstün gördüğünü bir kez daha mı ispatlayacaksın, görelim bakalım."
languages.original_text: "A fine time to show your true colours, Inquisitor. Let's see if you will do what is right or once again prove that you consider yourself above the rules."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek rengini göstermek için çok iyi bir zaman Engizisyoncu. Görelim bakalım doğru olanı mı yapacaksın, yoksa kendini kanunların üstünde gördüğünü bir kez daha mı ispatlayacaksın."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
